loadingNotes.loadingError.latestText: The exercise failed to load. Please check if the exercise ID is correct.

errorNote.oldText: Oops ... daar ging iets mis. {reason}Mogelijk heb je een verouderde versie van de web-app. Probeer een hard refresh (shift+F5) om te kijken of dit het probleem oplost.Is de bug er nog steeds? Stuur dan even een mail naar {infoEmail} (Hildo). Dan los ik de bug op, zodat jij en anderen er niet weer tegenaan lopen. Voeg waar mogelijk toe:Waar de bug optradt: welke vaardigheid/opgave.Wat je deed vlak voordat de bug optradt.Eventueel een screenshot van de rode foutmelding in de Developer's Tools console (F12).
errorNote.latestText: <par>Oops ... something went wrong. {reason}</par><par>It could be that an old version of this app is still present on your device. Try a hard refresh (shift+F5) to see if this solves the problem.</par><par>Is the bug still there? If so, please send an email to <link>{infoEmail}</link> (Hildo). Then I will fix the bug, so that both you and others won't continue running into it. If possible, also add:</par><list><item>Where the bug occurred: which skill/exercise.</item><item>What you did right before the bug appeared.</item><item>Possibly a screenshot of the red error message in the Developer's Tools console (F12).</item></list>

deleteAccount.explanation.oldText: If you delete your account, then all your data on Step-Wise will be erased. This cannot be undone. Of course you can create a new account afterwards, but this account will start from zero.
deleteAccount.explanation.latestText: If you delete your account, then all your data on Step-Wise will be erased. This cannot be undone. Of course you can create a new account afterwards, but this account will start from zero.
